sense.def:
Kadar z nekom ali nečim ravnamo
with scorn
, pri tem pokažemo zaničevanje.

seg.quote: This suggestion was greeted with scorn.
She had nothing but scorn for those who got themselves into debt.

sense.def:
To scorn someone or something
pomeni čutiti ali kazati prezir do nekoga ali nečesa.

seg.quote: She scorned the girls who worshipped football heroes.
What is now admired as art was then scorned as vulgar extravagance.

sense.def:
To scorn something
pomeni, da nečesa nočemo sprejeti, ker mislimo, da ni dovolj dobro ali primerno za nas;

seg.quote: Although his hearing was not good, he scorned a deaf aid.
